price: Uretse abo Nyagasani wawe yagiriye impuhwe (bakayoboka ukuri); no ku bw’ibyo ni cyo yabaremeye. Kandi ijambo rya Nyagasani wawe ryasohoye (rigira riti) “Mu by’ukuri umuriro wa Jahanamu nzawuzuza (inkozi z’ibibi) zose, mu majini no mu bantu.”
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡۗ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima rabbuka walidhālika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
